p: The bulb of C. abyscinicum (1 kg) ( Figure 1) was collected from the town of Alelitu, 44 km northeast of Addis Ababa, in April 2015. The authenticity of the plant was confirmed by Mr. Melaku Wondafrash, Senior Botanist at the National Herbarium, Addis Ababa University (AAU), where specimens were deposited with collection number BA0001.
